timeline.message: Add Backdoor methods to access archived course details
Standardize lower case for test case description
Use system default zoneId for date string comparison
Use system default zoneId for date string comparison
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/TEAMMATES/teammates into instructor-courses-e2e

timeline.bodyText: Why are these methods here instead of in backdoor? (just like verifyPresentInDatastore for example)
timeline.author: rrtheonlyone

replies.bodyText: verifyPresentInDatastore is actually in BaseTestCaseWithDatastoreAccess which is one of the ancestors of all E2E test classes. However, I believe that the courses page test is the only test that will require the verification of archived courses in the datastore and hence I left it at that level.
replies.author: jtankw3

timeline.bodyText: Is this method really needed? It looks like it is hitting the same endpoint as getCourse.
timeline.author: rrtheonlyone

replies.bodyText: It is actually a different endpoint as archived status is not saved in the CourseAttributes but rather in InstructorAttributes. Hence the GetCourse endpoint cannot be used and the getCourses endpoint which gets all courses by instructor id has to be used instead.
replies.author: jtankw3

timeline.author: rrtheonlyone

replies.bodyText:
Similar to above comment, it is because archived status is saved under InstructorAttributes and in order to get the archived courses of the instructor, the request must have the instructors user id. Without doing this the user field is null when using Backdoor.
This will also help other Backdoor requests in the future if user id is needed.
replies.author: jtankw3

timeline.bodyText: This is a minor nit - when you hardcode in "1" / "3" / "3" / "1", you may run into problems when the course details are modified (you have to change two places instead of one). Perhaps getting it programmatically might be better?
timeline.author: rrtheonlyone

timeline.message: Add retries for archive course verification
Add retries for archive course verification
Use system default timezone for deleted details

wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: There are items in Const.WebPageURIs that can be used here.
